title: Fast Juice and Air Cured Beef
description: It's time again to clear the docket. This week we are also returning to Juvenile Court! Cases from kids about embarrassing dads, pigeons, knuckle cracking, silent mode, and walking.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
